item.title: Field Loop Error
item.description: If you see the error below: ERROR! The field 'loop' is supposed to be a string type, however the incoming data structure is a <class 'ansible.parsing.yaml.objects.AnsibleSequence'> Upgrade your ansible to at least version 2.5. The ‘loop’ keyword is defined starting that version. See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/49680809/ansible-loop-error
